input.label: User-submitted data: Storage location and access policy

config.option: Minimal: No storage, only send the data by e-mail
Regular: Also store the data on the server, but only available in reports

input.help-text: If "Minimal" is selected, each form MUST have a working e-mail address to send the data to, or else data will be lost if the e-mail isn't sent. "Regular" and "Full" will enable running reports with the widget.
